name: Bolton Design
tag_list: design, branding, strategy, communication-strategy, website-design, mobile-design
overview:
Bolton Design provides communication design and strategy services for web technology and mobile firms.

Bolton Design helps clients find success through a variety of communication strategies including online, identity, print marketing and collateral and social media/networking. Services include: Design Strategy Brand Development Content Development Identity Design Web and Mobile Design Print Marketing and Collateral Social Media Strategy

Bolton Design also manages: Website Development Search Engine Marketing and Optimization

relationships.title: Co-founder, VP Creative and Business Development
